note.p: Education: St Paul's School; Trinity College, Cambridge. BA
Career: Called to the Bar at Inner Temple; Barrister on the Western circuit; specialised in ecclesiatical law; Bencher, Middle Temple; Chancellor of London; sang in the Bach Choir; died of pneumonia
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1922-1923 vol 102 pp i-x, plate, by Archibald Geikie
Proc Roy Soc Series B 1922-1923 vol 94 pp i-x, plate, by Archibald Geikie
References: W van der Kloot, 'Ernest Starling's analysis of the energy balance of the German people during the blockade, 1914-19' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 185-193
